headline: KLINGER VERTICAL TRANSLATION STAGE, MOTORIZED
description:
Motorized Vertical Translation Stage    Klinger MVN80 

Klinger acquired by Newport Corp
specstable:
Manufacturer Klinger
Model MVN80
Description Motorized Vertical Translation Stage, English
Accessories Mounting base plate
Motor adaptor bracket
Other Information Travel: 12.5mm
Table: 75mm w X 78mm L
Table height: 73mm

English bolt holes:
Motor: 12 Volt DC motor Stage may be used with an BM-17.25 micrometer(from Newport Corp.)
Micrometer not included
Exterior Dimensions
Width 7.500 in (19.1 cm)
Depth 4.500 in (11.4 cm)
Height 3.250 in (8.3 cm)
Weight 6 lb (3 kg)
